question: Who of the following has/ have secured 2020 Tokyo Olympic quota?
explanation: In shooting,  Abhishek Verma secured India\'s fifth Olympic quota place by winning the 10m air pistol gold medal at the ISSF World Cup at Beijing, China on April 27, 2019. He clinched the top spot with a total score of 242.7.  This is India\'s fifth 2020 Tokyo Olympic quota after Anjum Moudgil and Apurvi Chandela (10m air rifle women), Saurabh Choudhary (10m Air Pistol men) and Divyansh Singh Panwar  had secured berths.
